alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mason (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lake and southeastern Mason Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Fountain, or 11 miles west of Baldwin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Baldwin around 845 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Luther. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
